-- | By using this package, you can make application configurable.
--   
--   I inspired by xmonad. Xmonad is configurable by using user's own main.
--   This package make your application configurable like xmonad.
@package hsConfigure
@version 0.1.0.2

module HsConfigure
runUsersEx :: String -> Maybe Version -> Maybe FilePath -> IO () -> IO ()
